rows.label: tev001695_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey, [ST:playername ]!
Thanks for all you did for Mika and Camber.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0002
rows.name:
I heard they barely had to spend any time at all in the
ol' maintenance center.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0003
rows.name:
It's terrible about what happened to Fernand and
Hannah, but I'm glad at least those two made it back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0004
rows.name:
Hey, so do you remember what I said about the black
Skell back then?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0005
rows.name:
Well, I never had a chance to ask you...
Did you see it when the White Whale was attacked?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0006
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0007
rows.name:
Oh, you have amnesia? Weird. Did I know that?
Okay then. Hmm... Well, do you have any THEORIES
about the black Skell?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_JNK0010
rows.name: Dismiss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Alexa that it was just a normal Skell painted black.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_JNK0020
rows.name: Conjecture[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_SEL0021
rows.name:
Speculate that it may be the new model
that was being built in New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_JNK0030
rows.name: Declare[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_SEL0031
rows.name: Claim that it was the Ganglion Skell found in Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0016
rows.name: I don't believe that for a second![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0017
rows.name: Look, I know that black is a popular color choice here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0018
rows.name: But the shape of the Skell itself was different.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0019
rows.name:
Since no footage exists from the time between when
the White Whale was attacked and when it crashed,
I can't be sure, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0020
rows.name: You know why I'm asking about this, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0022
rows.name:
So you think it might have been the Prog Ares?
Well, that's one theory.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0023
rows.name:
But, how could a Skell that was built in New LA
AFTER we landed on Mira have been around when
we CRASHED on it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0024
rows.name:
...Oh my gosh. What if it wasn't actually there?
What if I saw a GHOST SKELL?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0025
rows.name: Hee hee! Wait, what am I saying? That's nuts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0026
rows.name: You know why I'm asking about this, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0028
rows.name: A Ganglion Skell?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0029
rows.name:
I'd be lying if I said there was no resemblance,
but why would a Ganglion Skell have been helping us?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0030
rows.name: Nope! Nothing about this adds up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0031
rows.name: You know why I'm asking about this, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_JNK0040
rows.name: Speculate[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_SEL0041
rows.name:
Suggest that it's because Alexa
wants to meet the black Skell.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_JNK0050
rows.name: Divert[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask Alexa if she's allowed to say "Skell" again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0038
rows.name: No, of course not![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0039
rows.name:
It's because I've launched an investigation into the
identity of the black Skell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0041
rows.name: Wow, way to cut me off at the pass.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0042
rows.name:
So yeah, I stopped mentioning Skells for a while,
but instead I was constantly saying "you-know-what,"
and Tika decided that was even more annoying.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0043
rows.name:
She told me to just do whatever the hell I wanted.
Then she threw up her hands and stormed off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0044
rows.name:
And as it turns out, what I WANTED to do was
investigate this black Skell![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0046
rows.name:
I'm searching for images of it and interviewing
potential witnesses like yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0047
rows.name:
After all, talking about how much I love Skells
is never going to accomplish anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0048
rows.name:
I don't know if this will either, but I think it's a step in
the right direction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0049
rows.name:
So if you hear anything or find anything relevant,
let me know, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001695_MSG0050
rows.name:
I'm going to track that thing down if it's the last thing
I ever do.[ST:wait ]
